Package apps

Filesystem applications.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ChangeDirectoryDummy Stand-in application for the change directory command.
Get Retrieves a file stored on the distributed filesystem.
Launcher Application launcher.
List Lists files and directories.
MakeDirectory Creates directories.
NamingServerApp Naming server application.
Parse Extracts the hostname or path portion of a remote path, and prints the result on standard output.
PrintWorkingDirectory Prints the current working directory.
Put Uploads a file to the distributed filesystem.
Remove Removes files and directories in the distributed filesystem.
StorageServerApp Storage server application.
Touch Creates empty files.
 

Package apps Description

Filesystem applications.

Filesystem applications provide ways to start naming and storage servers from the command line, and several client commands such as put, get, mkdir, and ls.
